dialogues.speaker: Duke
dialogues.text: What brings you to our kingdom, traveler?

dialogues.speaker: Traveler
dialogues.text: I seek the ancient treasure rumored to be hidden here.

dialogues.speaker: Duke
dialogues.text: Only those true of heart and strong of mind may seek the treasure. Are you worthy?

dialogues.speaker: Traveler
dialogues.text: I believe I am, your grace. Will you help me in my quest?

dialogues.speaker: Duke
dialogues.text: Agreed. But remember, great trials await you, Traveler.
